name: botbuilder-applicationinsights
author: Microsoft Corp.
description: Application Insights extensions for Microsoft BotBuilder.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-applicationinsights --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\doc\botbuilder-applicationinsights .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder SDK - Application Insights" --readme none
scripts.build:rollup: npm run clean && npm run build && api-extractor run --verbose --local
